  • Constructor Details

    • Ghost

      public Ghost(int startX, int startY, javafx.scene.paint.Color color, int respawnX, int respawnY, int fieldwidth, int fieldheight)
      creates a ghost
      Parameters:
      startX - x
      startY - y
      color - color of the ghost (blue, green, yellow, red, pink)
      respawnX - x coordinate of the respawn position
      respawnY - y coordinate of the respawn position
      fieldwidth - width of the field
      fieldheight - height of the field
